jei.sillystuff.description.recall_pearl: Shift-Click to save your current position, Right-Click to go back there
jei.sillystuff.description.animal_grower:
Makes Animals Grow Instantly
Also Works On Creepers to some extent
jei.sillystuff.description.better_scaffo:
This Scaffold Is ideal for building!
You can place it in a line by crouching while placing it!
The whole structure breaks if you crouch while breaking it
jei.sillystuff.description.accelerator:
This will accelerate tile entities in front of it
but in order to work it must be within the range of a beacon with the speed effect
bonus speed if the beacon is speed 2!
Yes you can use Multiple Beacons
chat.sillystuff.recall_pearl.nolocation: You Must set a position First!
